title: ErgAmountInputField
description: Text field to enter ERG amounts. Fixed decimals of 9 and shows a fiat value comparison label

id.description: The unique identifier for the element. Optional.

onLongPress.description: Action to be started when long press is performed

onClick.description: Action to be started when click or tap is performed

visible.description: Visibility of this object. Optional, defaults to true

error.description: Shows an error message on the text field if not null
